title: Database Optimization
description: Test your understanding of optimizing database performance, including indexing, query optimization, and caching techniques.

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of database indexing?
Which of the following query optimizations can improve performance?
answers: Using indexes on frequently queried columns

questions.question: Which of the following indexing techniques is best for improving search performance on large text columns?
What is database denormalization used for?
answers: To reduce the number of joins needed in queries

questions.question: Which of the following strategies is useful for improving the performance of complex queries?
Which type of database index is best suited for searching large numeric data sets?
Which of the following methods can improve the performance of SELECT queries?
answers: Using LIMIT to reduce the number of rows retrieved

questions.question: Which of the following is a technique used to handle large amounts of data in a distributed database system?
What is the impact of using too many indexes in a database?
answers: It can slow down write operations
It improves query performance for all queries
It reduces the disk space usage

questions.question: What is a common method for optimizing database writes?
answers: Increasing the number of indexes on write-heavy tables
